name: Fashion Boutique
hours: Mon-Sat: 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM, Sun: 11:00 AM - 6:00 PM
description: Fashion Boutique offers the latest trends in clothing, accessories, and footwear for fashion-forward individuals. Our carefully curated collection features both established designers and emerging talents, ensuring that our customers always find unique pieces that express their personal style.

name: Tech Haven
hours: Mon-Fri: 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM, Sat-Sun: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM
description: Tech Haven is your destination for cutting-edge technology and electronics. We offer everything from the latest smartphones and laptops to smart home devices and gaming equipment. Our knowledgeable staff provides expert advice to help you find the perfect tech solutions for your needs.

name: Gourmet Delights
description: Gourmet Delights specializes in premium food products from around the world. Our shelves are stocked with artisanal cheeses, fresh organic produce, imported specialty items, and handcrafted treats. We pride ourselves on offering high-quality ingredients for food enthusiasts and home chefs alike.

name: Home Essentials
hours: Mon-Sat: 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM, Sun: 12:00 PM - 6:00 PM
description: Home Essentials offers everything you need to transform your house into a home. From stylish furniture and comfortable bedding to decorative accents and practical kitchenware, we provide quality products at affordable prices. Our interior design consultants are available to help you create the perfect living space.

name: Sports World
hours: Mon-Fri: 9:00 AM - 8:00 PM, Sat: 9:00 AM - 7:00 PM, Sun: 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM
description: Sports World is the ultimate destination for sports enthusiasts and active individuals. We offer a wide range of athletic gear, fitness equipment, team apparel, and outdoor recreation products. Our staff includes former athletes and fitness experts who provide personalized recommendations based on your sporting needs.
